markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Withstand Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3611) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 79

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882); [Necromantic Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=884)

</column>

---

Through repeated exposure, you've trained to resist the damage wrought by undead. Your resistance to negative damage also applies to damage dealt by the attacks and abilities of undead creatures, regardless of damage type.
name: Withstand Death
